Parameters: String: the origin for which permissions are set
boolean: whether or not the origin should be allowed to use the Geolocation API
boolean: whether the permission should be retained beyond the lifetime of a page currently being displayed by a WebView
invoke(java.lang.String,boolean,boolean).Description: Sets the Geolocation permission state for the supplied origin.
invoke(java.lang.String,boolean,boolean).FullName: public abstract void invoke (String origin, boolean allow, boolean retain)

ClassDesc: A callback interface used by the host application to set the Geolocation permission state for an origin.
